org.jetel.plugin

Class Plugins

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.plugin.Plugins

  • public class Plugins
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all static method, which provide access to all loadable plugins. Firstly call init() method to load and check all version dependencies.

      • activateAllPlugins

        public static void activateAllPlugins()
        Activate all not yet activated plugins. All already deactivated plugins are skipped.
        Parameters:
        lazyClassLoading - whether the class references are actively loaded by the plugin system
